byooption.disclaimer: Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.longDescription: Carefully manufactured by hand, this high-quality carbon fiber spoiler enhances and customizes the car’s appearance. Clear coated to prevent corrosion and discoloration caused by UV rays. Installation is simplified thanks to double-sided adhesive strips.  To ensure proper driving behavior/aerodynamic balance, it is strongly recommended that the rear trunk lid spoiler be installed in conjunction with the front splitter.
byooption.name: BMW M Performance Carbon Fiber Rear Spoiler

accessories.description: Carefully manufactured by hand, this high-quality carbon fiber spoiler enhances and customizes the car’s appearance. Clear coated to prevent corrosion and discoloration caused by UV rays. Installation is simplified thanks to double-sided adhesive strips.  To ensure proper driving behavior/aerodynamic balance, it is strongly recommended that the rear trunk lid spoiler be installed in conjunction with the front splitter.
accessories.disclaimer: Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
accessories.name: BMW M Performance Carbon Fiber Rear Spoiler

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+

Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series

Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.longDescription: Enjoy the precise control and hands-on driving pleasure of the 6-speed M manual transmission with short shift lever; designed for executing smooth gear changes with ease. Featuring a "rev-matching" system, engine speed is reduced to match the optimum speed for the higher gear selected resulting in optimized upshifts in all driving situations.

byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW M3 Sedan models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $789 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $64,533 (MSRP of $67,595, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $3,000 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $62).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $3,000 down payment, $789 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.30/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $41,909.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: 2-way power glass moonroof with 1-touch operation slides back or tilts up to let in as much fresh air and sky as you like, while a wind deflector helps keep strong breezes out.
byooption.name: Moonroof

options.description: 2-way power glass moonroof with 1-touch operation slides back or tilts up to let in as much fresh air and sky as you like, while a wind deflector helps keep strong breezes out.
options.name: Moonroof

byooption.longDescription: With the touch of a button, the power rear sunshade can be extended to protect the cabin from the sun’s rays in warm weather, or retracted to let the sun help warm the interior in colder weather.
byooption.name: Power rear sunshade

options.description: With the touch of a button, the power rear sunshade can be extended to protect the cabin from the sun’s rays in warm weather, or retracted to let the sun help warm the interior in colder weather.

byooption.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
byooption.longDescription: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
byooption.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

options.description: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.

options.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

byooption.longDescription: The 7-speed M Double Clutch Tranmission (M DCT) is integrated with Launch Control and guarantees optimal acceleration from a standing start, with better values that can be achieved with the manual gearbox. The "Smokey Burnout" function allows for a certain amount of rear wheel slip while the vehicle is moving.
byooption.name: M Double-clutch Transmission with Drivelogic

byooption.longDescription: Enjoy the precise control and hands-on driving pleasure of the 6-speed M manual transmission with short shift lever; designed for executing smooth gear changes with ease. Featuring a "rev-matching" system, engine speed is reduced to match the optimum speed for the higher gear selected resulting in optimized upshifts in all driving situations.
byooption.name: Manual Transmission

Featuring a "rev-matching" system, engine speed is reduced to match the optimum speed for the higher gear selected resulting in optimized upshifts in all driving situations.
conflictRemoveOptions.name: Manual Transmission

options.description: The 7-speed M Double Clutch Tranmission (M DCT) is integrated with Launch Control and guarantees optimal acceleration from a standing start, with better values that can be achieved with the manual gearbox. The "Smokey Burnout" function allows for a certain amount of rear wheel slip while the vehicle is moving.
options.name: M Double-clutch Transmission with Drivelogic

byooption.longDescription: The M Carbon Ceramic Brakes provide a powerful back up for an exhilarating driving experience. Braking power is applied precisely in all weather conditions due to the durability and strength of the lightweight carbon compound ceramic material. NOTE:  Dependent on conditions and usage, features specific to the materials used can lead to operational noises particularly in wet conditions just before the vehicle comes to a halt.  The impact of moisture and road salt can cause the braking action to be equivalent to a conventional brake system.  This can for a short time be experienced as a reduction in braking action and can be balanced out by greater pressure on the pedal, where necessary.
byooption.name: M Carbon Ceramic Brakes
19" M Forged Black Double-Spoke Wheels Style 437 M with Mixed Performance Tires

conflictAddOptions.name: 19" M Forged Black Double-Spoke Wheels Style 437 M with Mixed Performance Tires

byooption.longDescription: Seeing a wide-angle view of your surroundings in the Control Display makes it easier to maneuver in tight spaces and avoid pulling into unseen traffic when emerging from a garage.
byooption.name: Side and Top View Cameras

byooption.longDescription: The Executive Package keeps you comfortably focused. A Rear-view Camera and Park Distance Control keep you alert when backing up, while the Head-up Display and retractable, high-intensity headlight washers keep you focused on the road ahead. In cooler weather, a comfortable temperature in the cabin is enhanced via the heated steering wheel and heated rear seats.
byooption.name: Executive Package

conflictAddOptions.description: The Executive Package keeps you comfortably focused. In cooler weather, a comfortable temperature in the cabin is enhanced via the heated steering wheel and heated rear seats.
conflictAddOptions.name: Executive Package

byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
byooption.name: Park Distance Control

conflictAddOptions.description: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
conflictAddOptions.name: Park Distance Control

byooption.longDescription: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.
byooption.name: Rear view camera

conflictAddOptions.description: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.
byooption.name: Parking Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Experience pure high-performance and ultimate motorsport feel with the specially developed Competition Package. The enhanced dynamics deliver faster acceleration (-0.1s for 0-60 mph), which come from a horsepower increase of +19 to 444hp (vs. 425), more direct steering ratio, Adaptive M Suspension with new settings in all 3 modes, New DSC setting and New setting for Active M Differential. The package also features 20" Forged Light Alloy Wheels, high-gloss black elements including the kidney frame, side gill and rear designation, and black-chrome dual tailpipes for the Sport exhaust. For M3 Sedan and M4 Coupe, the interior features M Sport seats with break-through elements in the seat back and front seat belts with M Stripes.
byooption.name: Competition Package
18" M Ferric Grey V-Spoke Wheels Style 513 M with Mixed Performance Tires

conflictRemoveOptions.name: 18" M Ferric Grey V-Spoke Wheels Style 513 M with Mixed Performance Tires

The package also features 20" Forged Light Alloy Wheels, high-gloss black elements including the kidney frame, side gill and rear designation, and black-chrome dual tailpipes for the Sport exhaust. byooption.longDescription: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of Important safety features.  Frontal Collision and Pedestrian Warning with City Collision Mitigation provides limited-force automated braking within low speed situations.  Lane Departure Warning employs a camera system which monitors road lane markings. Anytime the vehicle begins to move across a lane marking without the turn signals activated, this system vibrates the steering wheel. Correct operation is predicated on clear lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow or other masking factors.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of Important safety features.  Frontal Collision and Pedestrian Warning with City Collision Mitigation provides limited-force automated braking within low speed situations.  Lane Departure Warning employs a camera system which monitors road lane markings. Anytime the vehicle begins to move across a lane marking without the turn signals activated, this system vibrates the steering wheel. Correct operation is predicated on clear lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow or other masking factors.
options.name: Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight vibration in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
byooption.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

byooption.longDescription: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.
byooption.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot

options.description: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.
options.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot

byooption.longDescription: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
byooption.name: Heated Steering Wheel

options.description: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
options.name: Heated Steering Wheel

byooption.longDescription: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
byooption.name: Head-up Display

options.description: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
options.name: Head-up Display

byooption.longDescription: Retractable, high-intensity washers help keep headlights clear of ice, mud, road salt and other coatings, for maximum road illumination and enhanced driving safety.
byooption.name: Retractable headlight washers

options.description: Retractable, high-intensity washers help keep headlights clear of ice, mud, road salt and other coatings, for maximum road illumination and enhanced driving safety.
options.name: Retractable headlight washers

byooption.longDescription: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Bright LED headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend. For added convenience, high beams can also be automatically turned on and off, as needed.
byooption.name: Lighting Package

packages.description: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Bright LED headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend. For added convenience, high beams can also be automatically turned on and off, as needed.
packages.name: Lighting Package

byooption.longDescription: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
byooption.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

options.description: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
options.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

byooption.longDescription: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
byooption.name: Automatic high beams

options.name: Automatic high beams

byooption.name: 20" M Forged Star-Spoke Wheels Style 666M with Mixed Performance Tires

byooption.longDescription: Experience pure high-performance and ultimate motorsport feel with the specially developed Competition Package. The enhanced dynamics deliver faster acceleration (-0.1s for 0-60 mph), which come from a horsepower increase of +19 to 444hp (vs. 425), more direct steering ratio, Adaptive M Suspension with new settings in all 3 modes, New DSC setting and New setting for Active M Differential. The package also features 20" Forged Light Alloy Wheels, high-gloss black elements including the kidney frame, side gill and rear designation, and black-chrome dual tailpipes for the Sport exhaust. For M3 Sedan and M4 Coupe, the interior features M Sport seats with break-through elements in the seat back and front seat belts with M Stripes.
byooption.name: Competition Package

The package also features 20" Forged Light Alloy Wheels, high-gloss black elements including the kidney frame, side gill and rear designation, and black-chrome dual tailpipes for the Sport exhaust. For M3 Sedan and M4 Coupe, the interior features M Sport seats with break-through elements in the seat back and front seat belts with M Stripes.
